about_the_game:
A tile set for a lively fantasy-themed shop! It includes vibrant items to enhance your store, such as hanging and stationary meats, fish, plants, and lamps.

Why not pack your bag and a water bottle and embark on an adventure?

■Contents

Tileset x1

------------

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
